title: RED DEAD REDEMPTION FEATURING UNDEAD NIGHTMARE
headline: RED DEAD REDEMPTION FEATURING UNDEAD NIGHTMARE
subtitle: Out Now in Stores
content:
Red Dead Redemption is now available from the Rockstar Store and other select retailers for both digital download and physical purchase. Experience the epic Western adventure on PlayStation 4, now with support for up to 60 FPS on the PlayStation 5 via backward compatibility.

There's no better time to double down on the terror of Undead Nightmare â€” the supernatural twist on the Western genre and hallowed story expansion included with Red Dead Redemption.
